itemDisplayName: Deploys 2 Linux VMs under LB,1 VM as Database Node
description: This template allows you to deploys 3 Linux VMs , 2  VMs as WebFrontend Node with Load Balancer and 1 VM as Database Node , also Nat rules are configure to access the nodes using ssh and also nat rule for phpmyadmin for db node
summary: This template deploys 2 Linux VMs under load balancer,1 VM as Database Node
